title: Geometric Algorithms for $k$-NN Poisoning. (arXiv:2306.12377v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: We propose a label poisoning attack on geometric data sets against $k$-nearest neighbor classification. We provide an algorithm that can compute an $\varepsilon n$-additive approximation of the optimal poisoning in $n\cdot 2^{2^{O(d+k/\varepsilon)}}$ time for a given data set $X \in \mathbb{R}^d$, where $|X| = n$. Our algorithm achieves its objectives through the application of multi-scale random partitions.
context:
Title: Geometric Algorithms for $k$-NN Poisoning. (arXiv:2306.12377v1 [cs.LG])
Abstract: We propose a label poisoning attack on geometric data sets against $k$-nearest neighbor classification. We provide an algorithm that can compute an $\varepsilon n$-additive approximation of the optimal poisoning in $n\cdot 2^{2^{O(d+k/\varepsilon)}}$ time for a given data set $X \in \mathbb{R}^d$, where $|X| = n$. Our algorithm achieves its objectives through the application of multi-scale random partitions.
translated_abstract: 我们提出了一种针对几何数据集$k$-最近邻分类的标签污染攻击。我们提供了一种算法，可以在$n\cdot 2^{2^{O(d+k/\varepsilon)}}$的时间内计算给定数据集$X \in \mathbb{R}^d$的$\varepsilon n$-加性逼近最优污染。我们的算法通过应用多尺度随机分区来实现其目标。
tldr: 本文提出一种对于几何数据集$k$-最近邻算法的标签污染攻击。通过应用多尺度随机分区，我们提供了一种算法，可以在$n\cdot 2^{2^{O(d+k/\varepsilon)}}$的时间内计算逼近给定数据集的最优污染。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a poisoning attack on $k$-nearest neighbor classification for geometric data sets. The authors provide an algorithm that can compute an $\varepsilon n$-additive approximation of the optimal poisoning in $n\cdot 2^{2^{O(d+k/\varepsilon)}}$ time using multi-scale random partitions.
